snippet.title: Pikmin 1+2 - Launch Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Reintroduce yourself to the plantlike Pikmin and strategic gameplay that this charming series is rooted in. From finding a way home to collecting treasure, Olimar (plus Louie in the Pikmin™ 2 game) must partner with a parade of Pikmin to survive the harshest of conditions. Both games support optional motion controls for more options when guiding your floral friends. This HD release of Pikmin 1+2 is available now on Nintendo eShop!

You can save on both titles by purchasing the digital bundle: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/pikmin-1-plus-2-bundle-switch/

#Pikmin #NintendoSwitch #NintendoDirect
